headline: Essential Security Checks for Modern Apps

digest_items.title: Implement DMARC policy
digest_items.why: DMARC builds on SPF and DKIM to give domain owners control over email authentication

digest_items.title: Enable audit logging
digest_items.why: Audit logs are essential for incident response and compliance
digest_items.fix: Log authentication events, data access, and configuration changes

digest_items.title: Use secure random number generation
digest_items.fix: Use crypto.randomBytes() or secrets module, not Math.random()

digest_items.title: Implement API authentication
digest_items.why: Unauthenticated APIs allow unauthorized access to data and functions
digest_items.fix: Use OAuth 2.0, JWT tokens, or API keys with proper validation

digest_items.title: Disable directory listing
digest_items.why: Directory listing exposes file structure and sensitive files
digest_items.fix: Set 'Options -Indexes' in Apache or 'autoindex off' in nginx

digest_items.title: Enable MFA for all admin accounts
digest_items.why: Multi-factor authentication prevents account takeover even if passwords are stolen
digest_items.fix: Use authenticator apps (Google Authenticator, Authy) or hardware keys (YubiKey)

digest_items.title: Use security champions program
digest_items.why: Embedded security advocates improve security culture across teams
digest_items.fix: Designate security champions in each team and provide training
